resources.string:
Welcome to use PLog!

This is a powerful, light-weight and active developed library.
Any contribution or material bonus are appreciated and welcome.

Basic and common usages are shown below. For more details, please checkout from GitHub or see Wiki.

The New Teacher
 George comes from school on the first of September.
 "George, how did you like your new teacher?" asked his mother.
 "I didn't like her, Mother, because she said that three and three were six and then she said that two and four were six tooâ€¦"
 

TOM'S EXCUSE
 Teacher: Tom, why are you late for school every day?
 Tom: Every time I come to the corner, a sign says, "School-Go Slow".
Tap console TextView to backup logger.
